Posted By: James_Kernaghan (4/24/2013 2:21:00 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I for one can't wait to see the Wizards article that talks about how secretly awesome and Jonny-tastic this card is.  
  
"Okay, guys, I know what you're thinking. But you can use her with cards that care about highest converted mana cost! And she's soooo much harder to hit with the deadly new [Gaze of Granite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gaze of Granite)! And...wait, this is super secret tech here...you can ENCHANT HER. Or even, if you're really willing to splash for colorless, you can even try out some equipment. [Hedron Matrix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hedron Matrix), anyone? And if you reanimate her, hoo doggy, now you're just getting KUH-RAZY."  
  
Also, I like the flavor text. We too will put the ranks of the guild before you, Emmara.

Posted By: ItsHarvestTime (4/23/2013 6:16:00 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
2/5  
She's a [Hexplate Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hexplate Golem) (rated 2.0), at rare (-0.25), with color restrictions (-0.25). Granted, she does have one ability (+0.5), but tokens will still have trouble with:  
[Terminus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terminus)  
[Cyclonic Rift](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cyclonic Rift)  
[Supreme Verdict](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Supreme Verdict)  
[Sever the Bloodline](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sever the Bloodline)  
[Mutilate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mutilate)  
[Killing Wave](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Killing Wave)  
[Gaze of Granite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gaze of Granite)  
And other cards like [Aetherize](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aetherize) and [Blustersquall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blustersquall)  
I think people are rating her low because they expected her to be a flavorful and awesome guild champion, but she's almost a vanilla 5/7.

Posted By: FatalEagle (4/23/2013 2:52:46 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
She's quite bad and worthy of the ~1.5 she's hovering at.  
  
Let's take a look at each part of the card and think about it.  
  
5GW - A seven costed creature for green is understandable, so this doesn't necessarily mean much. No points taken off for this!  
  
Elf Shaman + 5/7 - This makes no sense. An elf and a shaman both lend for smaller P/T and an awesome ability. For the high cost, I could see her being 1/5 perhaps (to stave off Mizzium Mortars). Trostani is a 4-drop that's 2/5 and has two great abilities, for comparison. So the ability would have to be good!  
  
"Prevent all damage" is where this card goes really, really wrong. This should definitely be "All tokens you control are indestructible." For a 7-drop 1/5 (as I said above), this seems at least playable, if not 'good' necessarily.  
  
Let's compare her to Avacyn, an 8-drop 8/8 with flying and vigilance and all permanents including her are indestructible. Clearly Avacyn is better in every way, but at least Emmara would have a similar fla... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:

Elf Shaman + 5/7 - This makes no sense. An elf and a shaman both lend for smaller P/T and an awesome ability. For the high cost, I could see her being 1/5 perhaps (to stave off Mizzium Mortars). Trostani is a 4-drop that's 2/5 and has two great abilities, for comparison. So the ability would have to be good!

"Prevent all damage" is where this card goes really, really wrong. This should definitely be "All tokens you control are indestructible." For a 7-drop 1/5 (as I said above), this seems at least playable, if not 'good' necessarily.

Let's compare her to Avacyn, an 8-drop 8/8 with flying and vigilance and all permanents including her are indestructible. Clearly Avacyn is better in every way, but at least Emmara would have a similar fla... (see all)

Posted By: deixmachinis (4/23/2013 5:43:07 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
WotC utterly failed at this card. This and [Voice of Resurgence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voice of Resurgence) were meant to be one and the same, but they changed her to be rare to make all champions the same rarity. Instead of just balancing her ability into the rare level, they just renamed it and put no effort into making her a viable card. They claimed that they were designing each of the champions with commander in mind, but she horribly fails that test as well.  
  
All the other champions are great, but I feel really let down by this one.
posts.html:
WotC utterly failed at this card. This and Voice of Resurgence were meant to be one and the same, but they changed her to be rare to make all champions the same rarity. Instead of just balancing her ability into the rare level, they just renamed it and put no effort into making her a viable card. They claimed that they were designing each of the champions with commander in mind, but she horribly fails that test as well.

All the other champions are great, but I feel really let down by this one.
